name: An Insider Valentine
description:
Who doesn't want to reminisce about Valentine's Day? On February 14th, for a day plus one or two weekends every year, computer programmers everywhere, from professional to hobbyist, celebrate this glorious God-given day for all of us. 2019 brings us new blessings, so whether we like it or not the happiness we experience during this special day of the year is a very memorable and touching experience every year.

Decorate your rooms, pop out the champagne, and prepare those chocolates for that special someone that we prepare this entire day of romance for!

Works Cited:

Ren'Py
